mapper.select: SELECT MAGAMY AS YEAR, MAGAMM AS MONTH, ISMAGAM, S.USERSCODE, NAME, TO_CHAR(MAGAMDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') MAGAMDATE FROM MAGAM M JOIN STAFF S ON M.USERSCODE = S.USERSCODE WHERE MAGAMY = #{year} AND MAGAMM = #{month}
mapper.update: UPDATE SET ISMAGAM =#{isMagam} WHERE MAGAMY = #{year} AND MAGAMM = #{month}
